title: 5 Unbelievably Disturbing TRUE Crime Stories You Won't Believe Were Committed...

json.text:
00:00:04,600 --> 00:00:06,900
What would be the best way to dispose of a body
It's a disturbing form that must go through the mind of a killer after committing a murder
Well here are five are the most horrific murderers who found intriguing creative and stomach-churning ways to get rid of their victims
Kate Webster in
1879 Kate Webster was 30 years old and working for the widow Julia Thomas in Richmond London
The two women did not get on and one day Julia asked Kate to leave
Losing her temper Kate threw Julia down the stairs and strangled her to death
She then dismembered the body and boiled some event in the copper pot that was usually used for the laundry
She burned Julia's innards and bones on the fire and then packed. What was left into a Gladstone bag throwing it into the River Thames
She had to throw one of the feet onto a rubbish heap because it would not fit in the bag
Legend has it the Kate gave two cups of Dripping to a neighbor that was made from the boiling of the body
Over the next few days she began to sell off all of the furniture in the property which caused alarm to the neighbors
The police were called in but Kate fled to her uncle's house in Ireland
Once captured she was brought back and tried at the Old Bailey and hanged
131 years later workers were excavating an old pub in the garden of Sir David Attenborough's home when they unearthed
What was identified as Julia Thomas's skull?
Dr.. Buck Ruxton
book ciao rant angie was born in Bombay India in 1899
He moved to England changed his name to buck Ruxton and set up a practice as a GP in Lancaster
Becoming well respected unlocked by his patients
Ruxin lived with his common-law wife Isabel their three children and their housemaid Mary Rogerson in a large home
Isabel was popular on outgoing and often invited to lots of social functions in the area, but Roxton believed that she was having an affair
And on the 15th of September 1935 he lost control
He strangled her then stabbed Mary the maid who had probably seen the crime being committed
He then dismembered and mutilated the bodies in the bath before wrapping the parts and sheets
children's clothing and newspapers
Doctor Ruxton drove a hundred miles away, and hid the packages around the Scottish countryside
The bodies were identified using new forensic anthropology and entomological techniques
It was the first time that these methods were used to convict C criminal
Ruxton was hanged in a prison in Manchester and
After the trial the bath that he used was taken to Lancashire Police Headquarters and used as a horse trough
Leonarda Cianciulli
Leonardo was born in Montella Italy in 1893
She had 14 children 10 of which died in infancy so she was fiercely protective of the remaining 4
leonardo was known as something of a fortune-teller and in 1939 her eldest son joined the army to fight in World War 2
Leonardo decided that the only way to keep him safe was by offering up a human sacrifice
This is when a lady came to her and wanted to know how to find a husband
Leonardo drugged her and killed her with an axe she then cut up her body and drained blood into a basin
Through the pieces into a pot and added caustic soda
after the blood had congealed
She dried it in the oven grind it up with flour sugar chocolate milk and eggs to make crunchy tea cakes
which she then ate with her son friends and any guests who joined her thereafter a
Lady called Francesca was a second victim and much like the first. She was also given drugged wine and then killed her than acts
in her own words
This is what Leonardo did with his third victim she ended up in the pond like the other two
When she had melted I added a bottle of cologne and after a long time on the boil
I was able to make some most acceptable creamy soap I
Gave bars to neighbors and acquaintances the cakes to were better that woman was really sweet
once caught she was sentenced to 30 years in prison and the part that was used to boil her victims his on display in a
criminology Museum in Rome
Catherine night from 10 to field Australia had a string of failed relationships and was known to the authorities
because of her violent tendencies
She was once committed to a psychiatric hospital for leaving her baby on a railway line
She spent several years as an abattoir worker and her relationship with a man called John price was a volatile in
February 2000 she stabbed him at least 37 times
Several hours later. She skinned him and hung the meat from the door in the language
She then cut off his head cooked it and served it with baked potato an assortment of vegetables and gravy
Catherine then set two places at the dining table with name cards for his two children
When the police came after being alerted by a neighbor they found night unconscious in the house after taking pills
Prices head was found in the pot with vegetables, and she was sentenced to life imprisonment without parole
The first Australian woman in history to be given the sentence
Enric Quetta ma te en
Ricotta ma te was born in Spain in 1868 and as a young woman she moved to Barcelona where she became a prostitute
During the day she dressed in rags kidnapped children from the poor areas of the city and took them begging
At night she dressed in luxurious clothes and hired the children who were aged between 3 and 14
out to pedophiles in high society Barcelona, she
Also sold expensive slaves and potions to the wealthy
But no one knew she was making her remedies from the remains of the children, but she had kidnapped after she killed them
this carried on for over 20 years
And when she was eventually stomped the police found 50 jars and bowls containing human remains hair blurred
Powdered bones and pots of potions ready to be sold in just one of her many apartments
As a practicing witch doctor is also formed. She drank the blood of her victims
Giving her the name the vampire of Barcelona
in
1913 she was lynched and beaten to death in prison by her fellow inmates before she could be tried
so that's 5 disturbing ways killers have disposed of their victims bodies in the most disgusting ways if
Learning about the psychology and motives behind serial killers interests you and don't forget to check out our murderous mining documentaries
Thanks for watching
And my heart goes out to all those victims who died at the hands of these people and were then subsequently mutilated after passing
